as to STEPHEN DAVIS, JR-Detention Hearing AND prel examination set for 8/11/2011 10:30 AM in room #246, United States Courthouse, 46 E. Ohio Street, Indianapolis, Indiana before Magistrate Judge Kennard P. Foster. Signed by Magistrate Judge Kennard P. Foster on 8/8/2011.(CBU) (Entered: 08/09/2011)

S for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Kennard P. Foster: Initial Appearance on Complaint held on 8/8/2011. Charges Rights and penalties were read and explained. Defendant STEPHEN DAVIS, JR appears in person with assistance by FCD counsel Bill Marsh. Appearance for the USA by AUSA Michelle Brady for Brad Blackington. USPO represented by Thomas Parker.
